article_text:
Top 10 Cities for Summer Jobs

From camp counselor to sports marketing interns, great summer jobs are out there for those who look in the right places.

article_metadata.description: Medical error is the third leading cause of death. Take control of your medical care; that's how to stay safer, insist experts.
article_metadata.author: Robert McGarvey
